metadata.synopsis: An eye doctor (Judge Reinhold) from New York goes west and takes on outlaws with Marshal Wyatt Earp (Fred Ward) in Tombstone.

reviews: What distinguishes farce from sitcom from melodrama from satire? That seems to be a problematic question for Leon Prochnik's script, and although [this] engages and entertains at times, its overall lack of fluid style causes it to miss the mark.
